markdown: 2001 CCP PROGRAM – WALL MURAL APPROVAL THIS WALL MURAL APPROVAL is an amendment to the 2001 CCP Venue Agreement currently in effect between Kevin Berg & Associates, Inc. d/b/a KBA Marketing Group ("KBA") and the owner (the "Venue Owner") of the business establishment (the "Venue") described below. The following are defined terms for purposes of this Wall Mural Approval: DATE Date of Mural Approval: April 23, 2001 VENUE INFORMATION Venue Name: The Halfmoon Venue Address/Zip Code: 1225 St Mary, NOLA 70130 Venue Code: 4218 New Orleans, LA ## MURAL INFORMATION Type of Mural: option Mounted on Wall: [x] option Painted on Wall: [ ] Description and Dimensions of Mural: Mural is the same as last year. Still mounted on wall. Description and Location of Mural Area: Same as last year. Mounted above drink west on right hand wall - next to pose Table - Very noticeable from entry of venue - WALL MURAL PAYMENT INFORMATION Wall Mural Payments: $2000.00 TOTAL, payable on or before the following payment dates in the following increments: March 31, 2001: $ 500.00 June 30, 2001: $ 500.00 September 30, 2001: $ 500.00 December 31, 2001: $ 500.00 I. **AMENDMENT TO 2001 CCP VENUE AGREEMENT.** This Mural Approval constitutes an amendment to the 2001 CCP Venue Agreement between KBA and the Venue Owner. The following provisions shall be added after the fourth and final sentence of Section IV(D) of the Venue Agreement, entitled "Signage," including and referencing the Defined Terms set forth above: "1. Wall Murals. a. License Rights. During the Term, Venue Owner hereby licenses to KBA the exclusive use of the Wall Mural Area for the following purposes: mounting advertising boards or panels upon the wall surface or painting the wall surface to create artwork (the "Mural") that includes depictions of the Product and/or related logo(s) or other trademark(s). The Mural shall be designed and affixed in a manner exclusively determined by KBA. The Mural and its constituent elements, including boards and panels placed on the Premises by KBA, shall not be deemed fixtures, but shall remain at all times the personal property of KBA. KBA may remove the Mural and/or said property from the Premises at any time, in KBA's sole discretion. b. Payments. In addition to any other obligations of KBA under the Venue Agreement, KBA shall pay Venue Owner the Wall Mural Payments according to the schedule set forth above. c. Wall Mural Area Maintenance. KBA may enter the Premises upon reasonable notice to perform repairs or make creative changes to the Mural, in KBA's sole discretion. Venue Owner shall not permit the obstruction of the patrons' line of sight to the Wall Mural Area or attach or affix any additional advertising or signage thereto. Venue Owner shall immediately notify KBA if clear and full visibility of the Wall Mural becomes impaired for any reason. Under no circumstances shall Venue Owner or any of its employees alter, move, or remove the Wall Mural." All other terms and conditions of the Venue Agreement shall remain in full force and effect. IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties have executed and delivered this Wall Mural Approval as of the date first above written. <::attestation: Signature, Printed Name, Date Signed (left section), Unsigned (right section) Signature (left section): legible [Insert Name of Venue Owner] By Signature Richard Filemning/Manager Print Name and Job Title 4/23/01 Date KBA Marketing Group (National Field Manager) By: Signature --- Print Name and Job Title --- Date --- The left section contains a handwritten signature, printed name "Richard Filemning/Manager", and date "4/23/01" under the "Insert Name of Venue Owner" heading. The right section, under the "KBA Marketing Group (National Field Manager)" heading, has blank lines for signature, print name, and date.::> TOTAL P.02 52579 6823 ___ Source: https://www.industrydocuments.ucsf.edu/docs/zylj0226

The following are defined terms for purposes of this Wall Mural Approval:
DATE Date of Mural Approval: April 23, 2001
VENUE INFORMATION Venue Name: The Halfmoon Venue Address/Zip Code: 1225 St Mary, NOLA 70130 Venue Code: 4218 New Orleans, LA

## MURAL INFORMATION Type of Mural: option Mounted on Wall: [x] option Painted on Wall: [ ] Description and Dimensions of Mural: Mural is the same as last year. Still mounted on wall. Description and Location of Mural Area: Same as last year. Mounted above drink west on right hand wall - next to pose Table - Very noticeable from entry of venue -

WALL MURAL PAYMENT INFORMATION Wall Mural Payments: $2000.00 TOTAL, payable on or before the following payment dates in the following increments: March 31, 2001: $ 500.00 June 30, 2001: $ 500.00 September 30, 2001: $ 500.00 December 31, 2001: $ 500.00

I. **AMENDMENT TO 2001 CCP VENUE AGREEMENT.** This Mural Approval constitutes an amendment to the 2001 CCP Venue Agreement between KBA and the Venue Owner. The following provisions shall be added after the fourth and final sentence of Section IV(D) of the Venue Agreement, entitled "Signage," including and referencing the Defined Terms set forth above: "1. Wall Murals. a. License Rights. During the Term, Venue Owner hereby licenses to KBA the exclusive use of the Wall Mural Area for the following purposes: mounting advertising boards or panels upon the wall surface or painting the wall surface to create artwork (the "Mural") that includes depictions of the Product and/or related logo(s) or other trademark(s). The Mural shall be designed and affixed in a manner exclusively determined by KBA. The Mural and its constituent elements, including boards and panels placed on the Premises by KBA, shall not be deemed fixtures, but shall remain at all times the personal property of KBA. KBA may remove the Mural and/or said property from the Premises at any time, in KBA's sole discretion. b. Payments. In addition to any other obligations of KBA under the Venue Agreement, KBA shall pay Venue Owner the Wall Mural Payments according to the schedule set forth above. c. Wall Mural Area Maintenance. KBA may enter the Premises upon reasonable notice to perform repairs or make creative changes to the Mural, in KBA's sole discretion. Venue Owner shall not permit the obstruction of the patrons' line of sight to the Wall Mural Area or attach or affix any additional advertising or signage thereto. Venue Owner shall immediately notify KBA if clear and full visibility of the Wall Mural becomes impaired for any reason. Under no circumstances shall Venue Owner or any of its employees alter, move, or remove the Wall Mural."

All other terms and conditions of the Venue Agreement shall remain in full force and effect. IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties have executed and delivered this Wall Mural Approval as of the date first above written.

<::attestation: Signature, Printed Name, Date Signed (left section), Unsigned (right section) Signature (left section): legible [Insert Name of Venue Owner] By Signature Richard Filemning/Manager Print Name and Job Title 4/23/01 Date KBA Marketing Group (National Field Manager) By: Signature --- Print Name and Job Title --- Date --- The left section contains a handwritten signature, printed name "Richard Filemning/Manager", and date "4/23/01" under the "Insert Name of Venue Owner" heading. The right section, under the "KBA Marketing Group (National Field Manager)" heading, has blank lines for signature, print name, and date.::>
